category-def.name: francaplus.feature
category-def.label: Franca Plus DSL
category-def.description: This is the update site for the "Franca Plus DSL". The "Franca Plus Runtime and SDK" contains the requiered Franca Plus Plugins. Some additional third party dependencies can be found in the "Third Party Feature".

category-def.name: deployment.specification
category-def.label: Deployment Specifiations for Common API
category-def.description: Contains the features for the different deployment specifications
